SEARCH
Package message

Class Message

java.lang.Object
message.Message
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectMessage, Post
public class Message extends Object
Represents a message in the messaging system. Messages can be standalone or replies to other messages, and they can accumulate replies.
Since:
2025
Version:
1.2
Author:
Meetkumar Saspara

    • Message

      public Message(Account from, Message repliedTo, String body)
      Constructs a new message.
      Parameters:
      from - the account sending the message
      repliedTo - the message being replied to, or null if this is a new message
      body - the content of the message

      public Message getReply(int index)
      Retrieves a reply to this message by index.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
